name: LeapCR
overview:
After too many days at work thinking “Is this it?” we wanted to start a culture revolution at work.

LeapCR is a simple, cloud-based platform used by banks, insurers, media firms, retailers, hotel chains, recruitment agencies and local governments as a hub for company culture and corporate responsibility.

With social tools and integration with internal HR systems, all employees, company events, activities and photos are now in one place. In a Generation Y world of work, email, outdated intranets and those random network drives just don’t cut it as a collection of tools to let your culture thrive. Advanced, non-intrusive reporting functionality provides data to analyze the ROI impact on the business and the community of an engaged workforce.

Sotheby’s, Nationwide, Kenexa, Aegis Media, BNP Paribas, the Greater London Authority, Freshminds, Westpac and Logica are some of the leading employers running Leap. No training required, cloud-based, fully secure.
